issue_comments.body:
Dear José Luís,

Thanks for your contributions. I'll already merge those in the master including instruction in the README for running the Specs.

Regards

Manuel
I put in the README some instructions to run the Specs. Please review those and let me know your comments.
Awesome! Just FYI, this file is missing https://github.com/AgilTec/cadenero/Contributing
